Unbelievable experience here, buyer beware!!!

Bill promised us our “dream deck”. What he actually did was NOT pull a permit, NOT check property lines, build OVER the property line, leave nails and screws exposed for our child to hurt herself on, not clean up the trash or complete the project.

He aggressively strong armed us into paying ahead of completion and then ran away from the job. We are in the middle of a $18,000 litigation with him. He is shady and his own workers do not respect him.

An "old school" contractor. Not like the younger generation that would say anything to get the job. Our project was a split level deck and we had some structural issues as far as the upper deck and also connecting to the house. Bill was honest, as we asked straight up if A)it can done for a 10k budget and B) is the project worth the hassle for resale.

I called Bill, from “Professional Deck Builder”, to build me a covered screened in pergola. The project was started on October 10th and finished on October 27th. A couple days later, I noticed the wood door had split and was sagging down about an inch. I told them and he said he kept having problems with that door on other projects (so why keep using that door that has a 2 star rating online?). He said he would come fix it. A few weeks later, he tried to glue it back together and propped it up.

He worked on my sister’s back patio adding a room. She paid for it all and it still has not been completed. It’s been a YEAR!!! He never installed a ceiling fan she paid for and now the roof is already leaking!! She calls and he won’t answer and never calls back. Bad business!!
Their staff is knowledgeable and hard working. They arrived at the hour we had agreed upon, finished the task, and cleaned up the yard. I heartily suggest them.
